Best Video Trimmer & Cutter for Chrome. Cut and trim video online without watermark.
Video Cutter and Trimmer is a web app which helps you to effortlessly trim or cut video online. With this simple online tool, you can cut and trim video files without downloading complex software on your computer. Video Cutter and Trimmer is easy to use and works perfectly on your Windows and Mac. To take out the pause and shutters from your video, Video Cutter and Trimmer is your best option.

Main Features:
✓ Smart Cut
AI technology is introduced and allows you to mark and cut silent parts with only one click! With this tool, you can easily remove unwanted parts from video in a smart way.

✓ Trim & Cut Unwanted Parts
It allows you to cut or trim any parts of the video as you desire. No need to download any others, creating fantastic videos can be all done in your Chrome.

✓ Support All Popular Formats
MP4, MOV, MKV, AVI, and more other common video formats are supported in this chrome extension. 

✓ Precise Preview
The finished videos must be to your satisfaction as it provides a precise preview feature for you to preview your video once you finish editing and then trim or cut again.

✓ 100% Safe
Our Video Cutter and Trimmer do not collect any user information, so there are no privacy issues involved and you can use it with no worries.

✓ Free Included
Free to deal with 6 files with no more than 200 file size.  But it is a cost-effective video cutter chrome extension to cut YouTube videos or videos from other platforms.

✓ Professional Support
No matter you have any questions or inquires, please feel free to contact support@hitpaw.com , our support team will give you professional help as soon as possible.
